title: UniPath: Your First-Year Companion
subtitle: A peer-powered platform supporting academic and social wellbeing.

sections.heading: Social Wellbeing
items: Safe space for students to ask & share

Stronger Academic Wellbeing: First-years get practical academic support from experienced peers
Peer-led advice on study techniques, planning, and adjustment
Access to chatrooms for specific courses or academic discussions
Better Social Wellbeing: Open peer chatrooms foster connection and reduce isolation
Shared advice on navigating campus life, services, and social tips
